item.description:
There is an excellent and very descriptive article in today's New Haven Register about Sunday's upcoming performance. Give it a read, and see if you'd like to check it out with us!
http://www.nhregister...

Come on out for a great lineup -- live music from 6 to 8 pm, and the Katarina Boudreaux band at 8 to 9. Special guests - The Radcliffe Twins in action.
Katarina on vocals and piano, Dan Bianchini on upright bass, Derek Currier on Sax, and Jake Habegger on Drums. Best described as "Jazzy Blues that Rock!"
See you there!
-Neil
203-645-2008
item.name: The Katarina Boudreaux Band in Hamden
